item.title: Need Some help with attack emotes || And teleporting is messed up
item.dc:creator: @tipsyhitman tipsyhitman
item.description:
@tipsyhitman wrote:

When i attack with any axe it does the punch emote. I tried this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1351 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1352) //bronze axe { return 36; }
But when i attack the top of my body and head appear on the ground and i cant move.
I also need to fix the teleporting, when you teleport you show u at whereever you picked but you are still small. and it wont update on your screen.
Iâ€™m using pimpscape.

Edited
i fixed the attack emote but when i attack it does the emote like 4 then the damage comes up.
